datafield.subfield: Presbyterian Church in the U.S.A. (Old School).
Presbytery of North Alabama (Presbyterian Church in the U.S.A. : Old School)
North Alabama Presbytery (Presbyterian Church in the U.S.A. : Old School)
Its Minutes [MI] 1824-1844 (Presbytery of North Alabama; North Alabama Presbytery)

(Presbytery of North Alabama; also known as North Alabama Presbytery; erected in Alabama in 1824 by the Presbyterian Church in the U.S.A.; dissolved in 1844 because of the migration of its churches to a New School presbytery of the same name, estab. in 1840)
